import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

Your Photo Here

Hello! I'm Dzikri Razzan

I'm a passionate Android Developer and Software Engineer with a strong foundation in mobile application development. Currently participating in the Bangkit Capstone program, where I'm contributing to innovative Android development projects.

My journey in software development has been driven by curiosity and a desire to create meaningful applications that solve real-world problems. I enjoy working with modern technologies and continuously learning new skills to stay current with industry trends.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or collaborating with fellow developers on exciting projects.

Android Development Software Engineering Mobile Apps Team Collaboration
); }; export default About;
